snippet: Arjen Robben scored on a late penalty kick to lift Bayern Munich, the Bundesliga’s defending champion, over Borussia Dortmund, the 2011 and 2012 champion.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Bayern Munich beats Borussia Dortmund, 2-1; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Arjen Robben scored on a late penalty kick to lift Bayern Munich, the Bundesliga’s defending champion, over Borussia Dortmund, the 2011 and 2012 champion.

headline.main: Bayern Drops Dortmund Into Relegation Zone
headline.print_headline: Bayern Drops Dortmund Into Relegation Zone
